main event: On 2/21/52, a bright red missile disintegrated in mid-air near Ascension Island, reported by the steamship African Planet.
interesting points: The object was initially described as a bright red missile disintegrating in mid-air.
The report suggests that the object was probably a balloon or a meteorological phenomenon.
The mention of a 'Spirit Red Missile' and an 'African Planet' leaving an unspecified vehicle in mid-air raises intrigue and confusion.
The Staff Duty Officer's report also makes reference to an unidentified UFO report on the same night.
The document advises consulting Dr. Owens for a better interpretation of the report.
sighted object: bright red missile disintegrating in mid-air
witnesses: crew of the steamship African Planet
